description:
Hopeless foot fetishist Lance Heart gets more than he bargains for while spilling his guts on psychiatrist Maitresse Madeline's couch. His desperate desires for FEET lead him to strike a deal with the devil herself!
With the help of her minions (Daisy Ducati and Mona Wales) Madeline indulges Lance's every foot fantasy with shoe and stocking worship, toe sniffing and licking, hot foot-focused fucking and a foot job that renders Lance helpless to the magic of feet!
Don't miss Foot Worship's sexy and evil Halloween Special!
title: A Soul for a Sole: A Foot Worship Halloween Special
